remarks.format: ## Remarks 會提供相同名稱的 方法的間接參考。 provides an indirect reference to the method of the same name. 如果您想重新命名現有物件，或用已經存在的名稱為新的物件命名時，就會擲回例外狀況。An exception is thrown if you try to rename an existing object or if you try to give a new object a name that is already taken. 此外，如果現有物件未傳遞至方法，就會擲回例外狀況。In addition, an exception is thrown if you do not pass in an existing object to the method.
